message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $16,000.
I'm interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I understand your budget, the value of this product is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500.
